name: Lightspeed Dash Across the Hyperspace
description:
Dodge comets and get as many points as you can on this frenzy adventure through space!

On regular intervals the game will throw at you a sequence of comets. To avoid said comet shower you'll need to fulfill a sequence of randomized buttons. You can try and get futher and further each time!

Score Multiplier

At a certain time in the game, a  will appear, meaning that a rythm sequence will begin. You'll need to press  for it to start.

The more time you spend without allowing the sequence to start, the bigger the multiplier of your points will be.

But be aware that if you spend too much time you'll immediatly fail the current run. the symbol will let you know that you're about to loose when it turns to .

ControlsA, S and D or 1, 2 and 3Confirm on MenusW or 5Change the Color SchemeSpace or 8Credits

SFX by https://twitter.com/Trixelized

Fonts

  • Pixuf by Erytau
  • TinyFont by MatthewWelch

Made for the #nokiajam.

Thank you for playing!
